name: Game Exit
description:
A linear game where you have you have to discover the way to get out.

Used Crack musics from : http://pub.keygenmusic.org/mp3/!Others/

Thanks to the teams : AMBIENCE, BLeH!, DYNAMITE, ECLIPSE, iNFERNO

Used Substance Painter and SFX from Universal Sound FX.

Controls : Arrows, Enter, Echap to exit minigame.
